full_text:
TENANT OUTREACH AND INFORMATION.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 181,643, Eff. 5/31/11.)

	The Department, DWP and organizations authorized by the City Council may contact tenants.  During that contact, tenants shall be informed of the UMP/REAP and their right to forward rent payments into the escrow account for the maintenance of utility services, eviction protection rights, and rights for the release of escrow funds.

5.catch_line: Establishment And Maintenance Of Ump Account.

6.catch_line: Expenditure Of Ump Escrow Account Funds By The Department.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

TENANT OUTREACH AND INFORMATION. (§ 155.08)

  TENANT OUTREACH AND INFORMATION.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 181,643, Eff. 5/31/11.)	The Department, DWP and
organizations authorized by the City Council may contact tenants.  During that
contact, tenants shall be informed of the UMP/REAP and their right to forward
rent payments into the escrow account for the maintenance of utility services,
eviction protection rights, and rights for the release of escrow funds.
